Message.Jp: 遭遇した敵を討伐する

Message.En:
Rumors have been spreading lately that shadows 
are moving suspiciously in <NAME AREA>.
Message.Jp:
先日から<NAME AREA>で
怪しい影がうごめくのを見たと言う噂が広まっている

Message.En:
The White Guard Knights have also undergone a 
drastic transformation in the past 10 years. 
While they have become more efficiently organized 
and their coordinated actions have become 
faster, it seems that their ability to detect 
individual enemy creatures has weakened. 

Even though the presence of such intense dark 
energy still lingers, only a few are aware of it.
Message.Jp:
白衛騎士団も、ここ１０年で様変わりした
効率よく組織化され、連係行動が素早くなったのは
いいが、個人の魔物を嗅ぎつける力は衰えたように
思う
いまもこんなに濃厚な魔の気配が漂っているのに
気付くものはわずかだ
遭遇した敵を討伐する
